## Description
Process layers from Edwin

## Set up
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

### Packages
library(tidyverse)
library(raster)
library(sf)
library(lwgeom)
library(sp)
library(lubridate)
library(rgdal)
# library(stars)
```

## Raw data
```{r}
### Open files
cochabamba <- st_read("E:/bol_landtenure/INRA/cochabamba_valid.shp")
santac <- st_read("E:/bol_landtenure/INRA/santacruz_valid.shp")
apt <- st_read("E:/bol_landtenure/INRA/a_Predios_Titulados_20_valid.shp")

### Check for intersections
cocha_sc <- st_intersection(santac, cochabamba)
cocha_apt <- st_intersection(cochabamba, apt)

### If no intersections, rm object
rm(cocha_sc)
```
